DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine effect environment six-minute walk test performance individual chronic obstructive pulmonary disease due alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency . The aim study determine environmental impact physical performance population determine factor influence quality life . This study develop evaluate efficacy use indoor six-minute walk test determine eligibility ambulatory oxygen therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Environment Effect Six-Minute Walk Test Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask come Clinical Research Center ( CRC ) visit last one hour . Participants ask review sign informed consent document participate trial . If participant agree participate sign consent , follow procedure do . If pulmonary function test perform past 18 month , standard spirometry test perform . Participants perform two six-minute walk test , one indoors one outdoors . First , randomly assign perform either indoor outdoor test first . Then participants vital sign take , perform first six-minute walk study immediately vital sign take . Participants rest period two six-minute walk test least 30 minute . Participants perform second six-minute walk test procedure first test .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year . 2 . Have diagnosis congenital Alpha1 Antitrypsin Deficiency allelic combination ZZ . 3 . Have Forced Expiratory Volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 50 % predict FEV1/forced vital capacity ( FVC ) < 70 % ( Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease [ GOLD ] stage II , III , IV ) . 4 . Not currently prescribe Oxygen replacement rate great 2 liter . 5 . Willing able perform two sixminute walk test . 6 . Willing able provide write informed consent . 1 . Subject moderate severe pulmonary exacerbation 4 week study visit . 2 . History lung transplant . 3 . Severe concomitant disease ( e.g. , congestive heart failure , clinically significant pulmonary fibrosis , malignant disease [ exception skin cancer melanoma ] , history acute hypersensitivity pneumonitis reaction , current chronic hypersensitivity pneumonitis ) . 4 . Unwilling unable perform sixminute walk test . 5 . Mentally challenge adult subject give independent informed consent . 6 . In opinion investigator subject may compliance problem protocol procedure protocol . 7 . American Thoracic Society list absolute contraindication sixminute walk test : unstable angina myocardial infarction previous month .
